name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Selfish of a Rough Stone【#星街すいせい４周年LIVE 】 [RDHf9Tmdvpk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei performs the finale of the song 'Gunjou'.
Transition between songs as Suisei takes a breath and the music changes.
Performance of the song 'Tenkyuu, Suisei wa Yoru wo Mataide'.
scenes.song_name: Tenkyuu, Suisei wa Yoru wo Mataide

subtitles.original: 風に煽られ
subtitles.english: ...buffeted by the wind

subtitles.original: そしてまた君に会いたいと願い
subtitles.english: and wishing to meet you again

subtitles.original: 駆けてゆく
subtitles.english: I'll run on

subtitles.original: 駆けてゆく
subtitles.english: I'll run on

subtitles.original:
天球、彗星は夜を跨いで
作詞・作曲：キタニタツヤ
subtitles.english:
Celestial Sphere, Comet Striding Through the Night
Lyrics & Composition: Tatsuya Kitani

subtitles.original: 明かりが一つ灯った 灯った
subtitles.english: A single light turned on, turned on

subtitles.original: 天を彩った描写が綺麗だ
subtitles.english: The depiction that colored the sky is beautiful

subtitles.original: 僕の吐いた白い息のように
subtitles.english: Like the white breath I exhaled

subtitles.original: 消してしまえたらな
subtitles.english: If only I could make it disappear

subtitles.original: 押し殺して深く沈んだ
subtitles.english: Stifled and sunk deep

subtitles.original: 泣き声さえ聞こえているから
subtitles.english: Because even the sound of crying can be heard

subtitles.original: 君を刺した不安も苦痛も
subtitles.english: The anxiety and pain that pierced you

subtitles.original: 僕の青色で 塗りつぶして
subtitles.english: Painting over them with my blue

subtitles.original: 全部涙になって
subtitles.english: Turning all into tears

subtitles.original: 星の海を流れていった
subtitles.english: They flowed through the sea of stars

subtitles.original: 果てしない闇の中に
subtitles.english: In the endless darkness

subtitles.original: そっと這わせたら ほらほら
subtitles.english: If you let them crawl gently, see, see

subtitles.original: 彗星が僕の頭上を飛んだ
subtitles.english: A comet flew over my head

subtitles.original: 誰もいない夜の空を染めた
subtitles.english: Staining the night sky where no one is

subtitles.original: 深く寝静まった街の中へ
subtitles.english: Into the city that has fallen into a deep sleep

subtitles.original: 降り注ぐのは誰の悲しみだろう
subtitles.english: Whose sadness is it that rains down?

subtitles.original: 星はまた弧を描いて飛んだ
subtitles.english: The stars flew in an arc again

subtitles.original: 思考を晴らして
subtitles.english: Clearing the mind

subtitles.original: いつかまた会えるなんて言えなかった
subtitles.english: I couldn't say that we could meet again someday

subtitles.original: 星が降った後の街僕はまだ
subtitles.english: In the city after the stars fell, I'm still...

subtitles.original: 黒く澄んだランドの空を
subtitles.english: The black, clear sky of the land

subtitles.original: 箒星が彩るように
subtitles.english: Like a comet coloring it

subtitles.original: 君を刺した不安も苦痛も
subtitles.english: The anxiety and pain that pierced you

subtitles.original: 僕の青色で塗りつぶして
subtitles.english: Painting over them with my blue

subtitles.original: 君の涙をそっと
subtitles.english: Gently taking your tears

subtitles.original: 星の海に流し込むんだ
subtitles.english: And pouring them into the sea of stars

subtitles.original: 尾を引いたその光が
subtitles.english: That light trailing behind

subtitles.original: 誰かをまた救うから
subtitles.english: Will save someone again

subtitles.original: 彗星が僕らの頭上を飛んだ
subtitles.english: A comet flew over our heads

subtitles.original: この空を全部君にあげる
subtitles.english: I'll give this entire sky to you

subtitles.original: 言えなかった言葉の尾を引いて
subtitles.english: Trailing the words I couldn't say

subtitles.original: 降り注ぐのは誰の悲しみだろう
subtitles.english: Whose sadness is it that rains down?

subtitles.original: 星はまた弧を描いて飛んだ
subtitles.english: The stars flew in an arc again

subtitles.original: 街の喧騒を背負い去るように
subtitles.english: As if carrying away the city's hustle and bustle

subtitles.original: 君とまた会えるなら僕はほら
subtitles.english: If I can meet you again, look, I...

subtitles.original: 星の名前を一つ受け止めよう
subtitles.english: Will catch the name of a star

subtitles.original: 悲しみが溢れそうになること
subtitles.english: Even if sadness seems like it's about to overflow

subtitles.original: 地球で離れ離れでも
subtitles.english: Even if we're far apart on Earth

subtitles.original: 僕らは繋がっているから
subtitles.english: Because we are connected

subtitles.english: A comet flew over my head

subtitles.english: The stars flew in an arc again

subtitles.english: I couldn't say that we could meet again someday

subtitles.original: 星が降った後の街僕はもうずっと
subtitles.english: In the city after the stars fell, I've always...

subtitles.original: 君の行方を探してた
subtitles.english: Been searching for your whereabouts
